Paragraph: RESULTS : Mean right eye MRD at presentation was 36 . 98 degrees ( range 22 . 25 - 51 . 0 ) , compared to 38 . 40 degrees ( range 22 . 5 - 49 . 75 ) after follow - up ; P = 0 . 338 unpaired t - test .

| Disease |
| --- |
| MRD |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the term "MRD" is mentioned, which stands for "Macular Retinal Disease." It is a medical condition affecting the central part of the retina, called the macula. Therefore, I have identified "MRD" as the disease entity in the paragraph.
